name: Meow Curse-【Web】
description:
Tap on a cat to absorb surrounding cats!

Let's absorb a lot within the time limit and aim for a high score. Even if the cat overflows from the bottle, the game will be over.

There are three modes. mode 1→4 types of cats mode 2→5 types of cats mode 3→6 types of cats

※ You can see the bonus pict when you complete the ending completely.

youtube play video welcome! Game play is free, but commercialization requires copyright fees and original volume.

twitter →@CatShrineGame
※ The creator of this game is Japanese. The author can not speak English. I am sorry if I made a mistake in the words
